definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
to spin (cotton or hemp etc)/fine woven silk fabric

sentences.english: His waistcoat is beneath his coat .
sentences.chinese: 這件外套是毛棉混紡的。

sentences.english: Silk twill blends sturdy construction with supple softness.
sentences.chinese: 斜紋真絲混紡水嫩柔軟堅固的結構。

sentences.english: The various methods for improving quality of blended yarn are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了提高混紡紗質量的措施。

sentences.english: Blend fabric of wool and cotton is ideal material.
sentences.chinese: 棉毛混紡是理想的料子。

sentences.english: The individual blend variants with elastane fibers are also fully described.
sentences.chinese: 然後對彈性纖維的混紡變體織物也進行了全面的描述。

sentences.english: The man was very interesting in our products----differient color yarn. "The quality is good, and the price?".
sentences.chinese: 他對我們混紡紗很滿意，“品質很好，價格呢？”

sentences.english: This is alpaca, mixed with nylon.
sentences.chinese: 這是羊駝絨和尼龍混紡的。

sentences.english: For blends and colors, use an oxygen bleach.
sentences.chinese: 對混紡和有色衣服，應使用氧漂白劑。

sentences.english: Pure cotton yarn of polyester cotton textile mills began to spin, and other blended.
sentences.chinese: 一些紡純棉紗的紡織廠開始轉紡滌棉等其他混紡。

sentences.english: Are you OK? Your beautiful coat.
sentences.chinese: 這件外套是毛棉混紡的。

sentences.english: All-poly is probably worse than cotton-poly blends.
sentences.chinese: 全聚材料比棉混紡聚要糟糕的多。

sentences.english: Another towel trend that is beginning to take hold is blends of wood fibers and cotton.
sentences.chinese: 另一的方興未艾的毛巾趨勢就是木纖維與綿的混紡。

sentences.english: Number of import and export of cotton cloth, cotton blended cloth prices higher.
sentences.chinese: 純棉布進出口數量多，棉混紡布價格較高。

sentences.english: Strength of bamboo raw fiber blending yarn appear low valley at critical blending ratio.
sentences.chinese: 竹原纖維混紡紗在臨界混紡比處強度均出現低谷。

sentences.english: Strength of bamboo raw fiber blending yarn appear low valley at critical blending ratio.
sentences.chinese: 竹原纖維混紡紗在臨界混紡比處強度均出現低谷。

sentences.english: Sadly, though, many of the customs survived and were blended in with Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，雖然許多幸存者被關在同混紡基督教。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
